title: Meet the Newest Typophile Moderator Dan Reynolds
content:
Please welcome [Dan Reynolds](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205035122/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Dan%252BReynolds) as the newest moderator at Typophile. He’s amicable, he’s knowledgeable, he’s nice, he’s all that.

 [‹ 1912 Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205035122/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14261 "Go to previous forum topic") [File-sharing Felons! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205035122/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13329 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content:
**And he’s got an enviable set of curls!**

ƒ
Guess Hrant and I had better curb our immoderate instincts, or we’ll be double-teamed by Paul and Dan in their zebra shirts.
Guess Hrant and I had better curb our immoderate instincts, or we’ll be double-teamed by Paul and Dan in their zebra shirts.
Thank you, Paul and Dan for helping out with Typophile!
Congratulations, Dan. Welcome to the pool.
Its about time! :) Congratulations! I knew you had to be next in line.

Dandy move!

So, do you believe in instant reply overule? :-)

ChrisL

PS: Congrats to you Dan
